channel.title: How do i make Character rights lvl lv 3 make me owner with crown?
channel.description: i put my self on server and i went to characters and edit it and put 3 on character rights and it doesnt make me owner nor with a crown but when i type 2 in it make me admin, but i want 3 to work. can someone help me?

item.title: How do i make Character rights lvl lv 3 make me owner with crown?
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

when you’re 3 others can see the crown but you can’t.
But this will help:

All it is to add a bugfix:

open client.java, search for

out.write(playerRights);

then REPLACE that line with

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }

that’ll let owners see their own crown (which is the only playerRights group that can’t otherwise)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make Character rights lvl lv 3 make me owner with crown?

item.title: How do i make Character rights lvl lv 3 make me owner with crown?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

you do have a crown with three 3 rights,
but on most sources you just cannot see the crown.

Read full topic
